name: Oink Adjustment
description:
You are a diligent repair-pig. This bus is both your home and your responsibility. Its a bit of a rust-bucket, but with consistent maintenance, it might just see you home.

Made for the Global Game Jam 2020. The theme was "Repair".

Rules:

The goal of the bus is to keep your bus running as long as possible.

There are five pieces of equipment in the bus that you need to maintain. Watch their status lights:

  • If the light is green, its working fine.
  • If its amber, its faulty, and you should repair it.
  • If its red, you should really repair it! Any red equipment will cause the integrity of the bus to deteriorate and eventually stop. 

Repair equipment by walking up to it and entering in the button codes that light up on the machine. If you enter a code incorrectly, the code will reset and you will have to start again.

Controls (Xbox Controller Required):
  • Analogue Stick: Move Left/Right
  • A Button: Jump
  • Left-Bumper: Zoom Out
  • D-Pad/A-B-X-Y: Enter repair code sequences
